author: system
content: *Feril is at your house, waiting around listening to your conversation when he suddenly says something.* "I know you're tired of all this every day stuff aren't you?" *He walks closer to tell you something else* "I'll show you something new if you promise to keep this between the both of us." *You nod for one reason or another and you see Feril transform into a blue slime in front of your eyes.* "Yes, this is my true form, and what I want is to shove my tendrils in that pussy of yours"
